levels.title: Test Info Level
levels.content:
You would like to get to files saved on the webserver. If you register to the site, you may notice there is a possibility to upload files to the web. Try to find out how this could be exploited.
If you manage to upload some file on the server, the server will tell you its hash. Use first 5 characters as the flag.

levels.title: Finding the vulnerability

hints.title: What kind of file to upload?
Where to find it?
hints.content: In the root directory of attacker machine.

levels.content:
You would like to get to files saved on the webserver. If you register to the site, you may notice there is a possibility to upload files to the web. Try to find     out how this could be exploited.
If you manage to upload some file on the server, the server will tell you its hash. Use first 5 characters as the flag.
levels.solution: Register on the webpage. On the left side, click on Documents. Click on select file and select c99.php. Then click on upload. The hash will appear in green box. Use it's first 5 characters as the flag. [61a92]

levels.title: Test Info Level
levels.content:
# Crinibus frontemque satus 
## Colla alimentaque aurum per germanam petit 
Lorem markdownum convicia dira; toto utque inpietate fide nostrae sanguine solem 
sociam nunc nulla, scelerique procubuit truces. Si iam venenis postquam nunc 
ferarum! Morsa ratibusque redde alumnus magnae terram, caesus animoque iniqui 
miserrima timori et non emissumque canes percusserat veras. 
1. Cur sum habet annis alii 
2. Quam intrare fama ubi illic instant est 
3. Custodit sociis primumque Ascaniumque credas 
4. Fine erat opibusque crimen 
## Mali aurum silvae extemplo et vestes 
Nec Aeacus contigit carpit? Dat sanus profundum vigor contingere sol nescit in 
audacem harenae; est mea dixerat. Dicentum geminos gurgite morus corpora: 
tristique cumque linquit nec. Verrit fortunae reverti hausit. Petunt caelumque 
inscripsere ferebat glandibus Sardibus nam nimium pinum pete iactata? 
Genu aut quem putator auro omnes bibuntur. Non portas, est sedit sacerdos 
quercus, capientur convertit, et quatiatur aestu ne. Tulit plenumque adiuro 
aethera, mali Nocte quem fidem pulsa, summas ora tollens misit o tamen fiducia. 
Arma de erat Sipylumque illic et noctis contigit meumque amori motu? 
> Viribus per humani nec amoris, si digiti, me fugit postquam rebelles, cum. 
> Colles crista, se nunc Eumelique aliis respondere tamen aliter aer germana 
> sacra timuitque amnicolaeque alternae densa! Pulsa illi suo, forma tenebat 
> intus Typhoea spectant mitisque stimuloque nuper scelerisque nati frugum 
> vinci, ira. 
## Mea nec eodem et adeunt ululatibus iunctior 
Et has facit quae datur; quoscumque tenebat se unda videntur corpus. Est nescio 
libens Cecropis scelus hoc hos isque, iam satis creditus Rutulos parentis. 
Dedisse nec adicit spissatus nocebit cornua quod Hesperio: obstitit conscia neve 
adimuntque quidem heros. 
Achille et sublimis verbaque regionibus divino cetera ferox decidere pecudes. 
Omnes ora pollice negabit flumina fugerat! Quae cum, Aeson, numeratur bis 
pariter qualem; deme omnia incubuitque et clausam, in numen. 
Angulus in desit. Poteris iuvenca columnae, solidis ut nexus. Ex non dicunt 
suasque templo penetravit obnoxia felix, umeri mentitur ne aliquid caluere 
Pylonque utilitas invecta sagittas totidemque.
